description: This file defines a class OpenAITools that provides methods for interacting with OpenAI's API, including audio transcription, image generation, and speech synthesis. It imports external modules, handles API calls, and manages artifacts for media content.

classes.name: OpenAITools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with OpenAI's API, including methods for transcribing audio, generating images, and synthesizing speech.

methods.name: transcribe_audio
methods.description: Transcribes an audio file using OpenAI's Whisper API.

methods.name: generate_image
methods.description: Generates an image based on a text prompt using OpenAI's image API.

methods.name: generate_speech
methods.description: Generates speech audio from text using OpenAI's Text-to-Speech API.
